Hi {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for participating in the BlueWave Home Solar Loan Program!
Your home solar system is qualified to generate Solar Renewable Energy Certificates (SRECs). Utilities in Massachusetts are required to purchase SRECs to meet their renewable energy generation targets. BlueWave manages the sale of your SRECs to ensure you receive your solar earnings in the most efficient way.
To be extra efficient, we'd like to deposit your SREC earnings directly into your bank account. To make this happen, please provide your direct deposit information here.
If you have any questions about your Home Solar Loan, contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) SUN-4100 Weâ€™re happy to help.
